title: regression: increase in startup time
body:
#### What is the problem?
Just felt that invocation of `datalad` became slower.  Seems to be possibly a `datalad.metadata.search` to blame for adding 136 ms:

```shell
$> DATALAD_LOG_TIMESTAMP=1 DATALAD_LOG_LEVEL=2 datalad 2>&1 | tools/dtime
    8 2018-02-11 00:21:03,636 [Level 5] Instantiating ssh manager
    1 2018-02-11 00:21:03,644 [Level 5] Done importing main __init__
    5 2018-02-11 00:21:03,645 [Level 5] Importing cmdline.main
    0 2018-02-11 00:21:03,650 [Level 5] Done importing cmdline.main
    0 2018-02-11 00:21:03,650 [Level 5] Starting main(None)
   68 2018-02-11 00:21:03,650 [Level 5] Starting to setup_parser
   12 2018-02-11 00:21:03,718 [Level 5] Importing support.network
    1 2018-02-11 00:21:03,730 [Level 5] Done importing support.network
    - |   if True, don't return annex special remotes", we split into [('exclude_special_remotes', "exclude_special_remotes: bool, optional\n  if True, don't return annex special remotes")]
    0 2018-02-11 00:21:03,731 [DEBUG] parseParameters: Given "exclude_special_remotes: bool, optional
    - |   return only remotes which have urls", we split into [('with_urls_only', 'with_urls_only : bool, optional\n  return only remotes which have urls')]
    1 2018-02-11 00:21:03,731 [DEBUG] parseParameters: Given "with_urls_only : bool, optional
    2 2018-02-11 00:21:03,732 [Level 5] Importing dataset
    2 2018-02-11 00:21:03,734 [Level 5] Importing module datalad.distribution.create
    4 2018-02-11 00:21:03,736 [DEBUG] Building doc for <class 'datalad.interface.annotate_paths.AnnotatePaths'>
    3 2018-02-11 00:21:03,740 [DEBUG] Building doc for <class 'datalad.distribution.subdatasets.Subdatasets'>
...
    0 2018-02-11 00:21:03,797 [Level 5] Importing module datalad.plugin
    3 2018-02-11 00:21:03,797 [DEBUG] Building doc for <class 'datalad.plugin.Plugin'>
  136 2018-02-11 00:21:03,800 [Level 5] Importing module datalad.metadata.search
    2 2018-02-11 00:21:03,936 [DEBUG] Building doc for <class 'datalad.metadata.metadata.Metadata'>
    4 2018-02-11 00:21:03,938 [DEBUG] Building doc for <class 'datalad.metadata.search.Search'
...
```
